resources.string: You find yourself in a dark forest. Alone. Cold. The wind howls through the trees…at least you hope it was the wind. To your left, a yellow light shines in the distance. Maybe a fire. Too far to make out any real details. To your right, you hear a river flowing and what sounds like a woman singing.

As you near the light, you see that it isn’t coming from a fire, but a lantern. An old man sits in front of it with his hands outstretched as if he were trying to warm them by it. You approach carefully and stop just outside of the arms of the lantern’s glow.
